data.title: Nintendo Switch Video Games
data.meta_description: Shop eBay for great deals on Nintendo Switch Video Games. You'll find new or used products in Nintendo Switch Video Games on eBay. Free shipping on selected items.
data.text:
Explore Interactive Entertainment Options With Nintendo Switch Video Games

The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid video game console that supports cross-platform entertainment and can act as a standard home system or portable device. Various developers create and release single-player and party games for the Switch that span several genres and include elements many gamers can enjoy. Understanding a bit about the kinds of games for Nintendo Switch that you can purchase and what they might consist of can help you find the ones that fit your style of play.

What genres are included in games for the Nintendo Switch?

Titles for the Nintendo Switch cover several genres, and you may wish to create a collection of both standard and online games from several of your favorites. Some of the usual categories you can look through for Switch games on eBay include genres such as:

JRPG – A JRPG is one variation of the role-playing video game. It usually includes a fixed, somewhat linear plot and turn-based battles in which players can participate. Many JRPGS are also stylistically influenced by Japanese anime.

Fighting – Nintendo Switch games in this category usually feature 2D side-scrolling and one character pitted against an opponent in combat.

Party – Party games strongly focus on group activities you can share with friends. Many Super Mario games feature party elements where people can choose a character and play together.

When should you consider used Nintendo Switch games?

You'll find a wide selection of new and pre-owned games for the Nintendo Switch on eBay. If you want to pick up a collection of titles at a low price point that works for your budget, it is a good idea to check out the kinds of games you can find for sale in the used section. Some older titles that are not available as brand-new items show up for reasonable prices as pre-owned games that you can purchase for your Switch.

Choosing editions for Nintendo Switch games

Games for the Nintendo Switch console can feature several releases that include different features you might enjoy. You can use eBay to find the edition of a particular title that is right for you:

Standard – A standard Switch game will include all the essential features necessary for the full story.

Ultimate – This version usually includes the standard game and any additional content the publisher released later. Other content may include more levels, extras, characters, physical accessories, or a soundtrack.

Which Switch Games does eBay Sell?

There is a large variety of video game genres and used switch games available on the Nintendo Switch, including adventure games, shooters, simulations, party games, racers, platformers, and much more. Here’s just a handful of some of the best switch games on Nintendo Switch:

Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: The Mario Kart series returns on the Nintendo Switch with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, the latest in Nintendo’s long-running kart-racing franchise. With 41 characters and 48 racetracks to play right from the start, it’s the biggest Mario Kart yet! Challenge your friends through local or online multiplayer races, compete in the single-player Grand Prix, or go head-to-head in the all-new Battle Mode.

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild: Nintendo revitalized its iconic The Legend of Zelda series with Breath of the Wild, adding open-world and survival elements to this adventure game franchise. Explore the vast Kingdom of Hyrule, ravaged by an ancient evil, and gather the strength needed to conquer the monster Calamity Ganon once and for all.

Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Gaming icons clash in the ultimate showdown you can play anytime, anywhere. Go head-to-head in fighting game madness with some of Nintendo’s most prominent names like Mario, Link, Pikachu, Kirby, and Yoshi, plus all-stars like Cloud, Sonic, Mega Man, Ryu, Simon Belmont, and more! Over 70 characters, including every fighter from every past Super Smash Bros. game, are jam-packed into this critically acclaimed game.

Super Mario Maker 2: Play, create, and upload side-scrolling Super Mario courses anytime, anywhere with Super Mario Maker 2! With five different game styles to choose from – Super Mario Bros., Super Mario Bros. 3, Super Mario World, New Super Mario Bros., and Super Mario 3D World – your only limit is your imagination! With millions of player-made courses (and growing!) available to download, the fun never ends.

Fire Emblem: Three Houses: War is coming to the continent of Fódlan. Here, the order is maintained by the Church of Seiros, which hosts the prestigious Officer’s Academy within its headquarters. You are invited to teach in one of its three mighty houses, each comprised of students brimming with personality and represented by a royal from one of three territories. As their professor, you must lead your students in their academic lives and in turn-based, tactical RPG battles wrought with strategic new twists to overcome. Which house and which path will you choose?

Super Mario Odyssey: Explore incredible places far from the Mushroom Kingdom as you join Mario and his new ally, Cappy, on a massive, globe-trotting 3D platforming adventure! Use extraordinary new abilities—like the power to capture and control objects, animals, and enemies—to collect Power Moons so you can power up the Odyssey airship and save Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans!

…and many more! eBay has many new and used Nintendo Switch games for sale, so scroll on to see what else we have to offer!

Essential Things to Think About When Buying Used Nintendo Switch Video Games

When buying Nintendo Switch games that are used, there are a few things that you should consider:

Condition: A video game's condition can strongly affect its performance, so be sure to have confidence in the item’s physical quality before bidding or buying!

Rating: Look at the game's rating before purchasing—especially if it’s for a child! Some game content may not be suitable for younger audiences. The ESRB’s rating guide provides more information about video game ratings.

Content: Assure that the game you choose has a good concept and is something you'll enjoy. Nothing’s worse than playing a game you don’t think is fun!
